### CCGS Griffon Propulsion Control Upgrade
#### Solicitation Number: F7049-220040/A

This document announces the solicitation of proposals for the CCGS Griffon Propulsion Control Upgrade project. The project aims to upgrade the existing Propulsion Control System onboard CCGS Griffon, a Canadian Coast Guard vessel.

#### Project Overview
The solicitation seeks suppliers to design and supply a new Propulsion Control System, as well as provide a fifteen-month performance support period. The successful supplier will be responsible for replacement and upgrade of the existing Propulsion Control System, and deliver the new system to the Canadian Coast Guard Base in Prescott, Ontario.

#### Contract Duration
The contract will be effective from October 2022 to October 2026.

#### Trade Agreement
The requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), which specifies the rules and regulations governing trade between the government and suppliers.

#### Preference for Canadian Goods and Services
The government has a preference for Canadian goods and services, as outlined in the CFTA.

#### Exchange Rate Fluctuation Adjustment and Economic Price Adjustment
The solicitation and resulting contract will allow for exchange rate fluctuations and economic price adjustments.

#### Evaluation Criteria
To be declared responsive, bidder's proposal must meet all mandatory requirements. The responsive bid with the lowest bid price will be recommended for award of a contract.

#### Contact Information
For more information, please contact Mastaneh Pourmand, Contracting Authority, at (343) 543-2874 or [mastaneh.pourmand@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mastaneh.pourmand@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

#### Documents and Attachments
The tender documents, including the Statement of Work (SOW) and bid form, are available at [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). The solicitation and its attachments can be accessed by following the link: [F7049-220040/A Soliciatation Attachments](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/12/e787f4b9336bf89409dd0c119d630e43/f7049-220040-a_soliciatation_attachments.zip).

#### Tender Closing Date
The tender closing date is October 20, 2022 at 14:00:00.
